caption.title: Study sites.
caption.p: Brazilian states (shaded dark gray) considered in this study (north to south): Rio Grande do Norte (RN) and Bahia (BA). Beaches (black points) considered in this study, from north to south: Cacimbinhas, Madeiro, Chapadao, Minas, and Sibauma in RN; and Imassai, Praia do Forte, Arembepe, Santa Maria, and Busca Vida in BA.
